message.body: Well I'm here right now all by my lonesome :( But I can't stay
I LOVE Richard's work. I bought one of his prints. Shhhh. :D
We're on the way, be there in 10 mins maybe?
I'm sorry, I had to go :/ The only time I could make it was right at the beginning
Woof, sorry to miss you! Let's get a dinner/beer/etc soon
Yes, let's! And please tell Richard I'm really glad I got to see his work. Just leave out the part where I bought one :)
